alert.note: Alert for Coffee; Dale (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 30 at 3:25PM CST by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northern Dale and northeastern Coffee Counties through 400 PM CST... At 325 PM CST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Doster to 6 miles northwest of New Brockton. Movement was east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Elba, Fort Rucker, Ozark, Ariton, Mixons Crossroads, Bells Crossroads, Dill, Hooper Stage Field, Camp Humming Hills, Mabson, Arguta, Snells Crossroads, Roeton, Dale County Lake, Marley Hill, Camp Alaflo Bsa, Phillips Crossroads, Hwy 231 Pea River Bridge, Woodland Grove Church and Java. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
